/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural elements. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, lush and green, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
